name: vulnerability-analysis-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for vulnerability analysis using OpenAI API

scripts.build: rm -rf dist function.zip && mkdir -p dist/file-search && cp -a lambda.js ../ai-chat.js package.json ../files dist/ && cp ../file-search/util.js dist/file-search/ && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip .
